)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		cfg := config.New(ctx, "")
		serverName := cfg.RequireObject("serverName")
		_, err := Sms.GetSourceServers(ctx, &sms.GetSourceServersArgs{
			Name: pulumi.StringRef(serverName),
		}, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The disk type. The value can be <strong>BOOT</strong>, <strong>OS</strong> and <strong>NORMAL</strong>.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="name_nodejs">

    <dd><p>Specifies the name of the source server.</p>

            title="Required">
